text: Has anyone noticed the odd behavior when clicking inside Content Settings Edit Head / Footer HTML sections?    When clicked inside occasionally it sends me to the top of the page...

for form embeds, is there automatically validation on them for emails like `<mailto:test@abc.com|test@abc.com>` or is this taken from the forms settings? Right now, the form seems to be rejecting this domain yet the form has not set to block any domains.
anyone having problem updating headers/footers on their client portals? seems to be an issue here this morning. Updates on the template but doesn't change on the pages.

So it looks like its an issue with the default subscribe to blog form that HS has. It does not allow `@abc.com` to be a valid address when submitting (regardless of settings). Is there anyway an HS Engineer can take a look at this and let us know what default addresses are not accepted?

"Updating published content is delayed for all customers

"Weâ€™re actively investigating an issue causing a 2 hour delay in updating published content. We will update this status as more information becomes available."
